1321630.name: Super Ubie Island 2
1321630.description:
NEW Pre-Alpha Demo!



Super Ubie Island 2 is under active development, and your feedback is invaluable. Dive into the pre-alpha demo, share your thoughts, and help shape the final game.





Embark on an exciting platforming adventure with Super Ubie Island 2! This game is a heartfelt tribute to the 90s classics, bringing a mix of nostalgia and fresh gameplay to players of all ages.

Features



  • Classic Platforming Gameplay: Relive the magic of 90s platformers with gameplay inspired by Sonic the Hedgehog, Donkey Kong Country, Super Mario Bros 3, and Kirby. Traverse through beautifully crafted levels filled with secrets, obstacles, and enemies.

  • Over 25 Levels: Dive into a wide range of levels, each with its own unique challenges and secrets to uncover.

  • Challenging Bosses: Face off against formidable bosses that will test your platforming skills and strategy.

  • Hand-Drawn Art and Animation: Explore a world brought to life with stunning hand-drawn art and smooth animations. Each level offers a unique visual and gameplay experience.

  • Captivating Story and Characters: Help Ubie as he returns to Climate Island to rescue his Ubalien friends who have been captured by the nefarious Dr. Terrestrial. Encounter a delightful cast of characters, each adding depth and charm to the adventure.

  • Difficulty Modes: Choose from different difficulty modes to match your preferred level of challenge, including the Nubie mode for a more relaxed experience.

  • Tons of Collectables: Hunt for a variety of collectibles scattered throughout the levels, adding an extra layer of challenge and replayability.

  • Mini Games and Secret Areas: Discover hidden mini-games and secret areas that offer additional gameplay and rewards.

  • Robust Soundtrack: Enjoy a rich and immersive soundtrack that complements the game's action and environments.

Add Super Ubie Island 2 to your wishlist now to stay updated on all the latest news and developments. Join Ubie on an unforgettable journey and rediscover the joy of classic platformers with a modern twist!
